creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: round-bodied vessel with gilt rim and two small handles; three small gilded feet; bombe sides and base decorated in red, yellow, green, black, mauve and white enamels on a turquoise-blue ground in scrolling lotus design
markings: Qianlong mark above [Cun], on plate on bottom; two stickers, one from dealer, inside
title: Incense burner
